properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) LISTCOUNT FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_STATUS = 'N'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , MEM_USERID , NOTICE_COUNT , NOTICE_ENROLL_DATE FROM NOTICE JOIN MEMBER USING(MEM_NO) WHERE NOTICE_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

INSERT INTO NOTICE ( NOTICE_NO , MEM_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , FILE_PATH , NOTICE_ENROLL_DATE , FILE_MODIFYNAME , FILE_ORIGINNAME ) VALUES ( SEQ_NOTICENO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE
, ? , ? )
